text: Yesterday is a 2004 South African drama movie directed by Darrell Roodt and starring Kenneth Khambula, Leleti Khumalo, Harriet Lenabe, Lihle Mvelase. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 2005. ==Other websites== * Category:2004 drama movies Category:South African drama movies Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies directed by Darrell Roodt
title: Yesterday (2004 movie)
